item.title: Costs of a firewall for Home or Small Business
item.description: The trend of malware being directly targeted to homes and small businesses continues to grow. 2016 was the year of ransomware and 2017 has been no better. You need a secure network to protect your family and your business. Here is a sample quote for a five user single location office with a local file server. This assumes that there is a basic network, PCs and a server in place.
